info.name: PDC Classifications & Lookup API
info.description: Complete CRUD operations for PDC Classifications and Lookup API with unified service architecture, comprehensive testing including batch operations and advanced pagination (offset & cursor-based). Updated for Azure Functions with /api/ prefix and unified service support (v4.0.0)
